dct:title.value: Reproductive performance of dairy cows under field condition of Assam state

bibo:abstract.value: The data was generated on field scale by personal interviews with the livestock owners in Assam. The least square means of service period, gestation period and calving interval for Jersey X Local cows were 118.33 Â± 1.63, 275.74 Â± 0.46 and 393.68 Â± 1.64 days, respectively. The corresponding values for Holstein Friesian X Local were 146.96 Â± 1.85, 275.81 Â± 0.53 and 422.26 Â± 1.85 days and that of Local cows as 265.06 Â± 1.87, 274.12 Â± 0.53 and 538.32 Â± 1.85 days, respectively. The effect of genetic group, season of calving and parity was highly significant (p0.01) on service period and calving interval. The gestation period was significantly (p0.05) influenced by genetic group.
